Metadata.Name: Governance
Metadata.Description: Configuration, auditing, and implementation of governance frameworks, specializing in on-chain organizations and smart contract-based structures.

Package.Name: Governance Audit
Package.Description: Analysis and assessment of governance structures with recommendations

Tier.Name: Preliminary
Tier.Description: High-level review of governance structures with risk identification

Tier.Name: Comprehensive
Tier.Description: Detailed analysis of governance structures with benchmarking and actionable recommendations

Package.Name: Governance Framework
Package.Description: Creation and implementation of governance frameworks

Tier.Name: Template + Review
Tier.Description: Adaptation of existing governance templates with implementation review

Tier.Name: Bespoke + Guided
Tier.Description: Design of bespoke governance framework with guided implementation

Example.Name: Education DAO
Example.Description: Entity formatation with integrated smart contracts, custom governance framework design, coaching and guidance provided for team members

Package.Name: Grants Program
Package.Description: Design and management of onchain grants programs

Tier.Name: Design
Tier.Description: Design of onchain grants program structure and evaluation framework

Tier.Name: Design + Management
Tier.Description: Design and management of onchain grants program including tooling setup

Example.Name: OpenCivics
Example.Description: Deployed and operated three quarterly grant rounds using quadratic funding smart contracts, disbursing over a total of $100,000 in stablecoins.

Services.Service: Limited email support for strategic questions (48hr response time)
Diagnostic assessment of key governance processes and documents

Retainer.Name: Governance Council
Retainer.Description: Facilitation support for regular governance meetings and proposal reviews

Services.Service: Review of up to 5 governance proposals per month

Metadata.Name: Knowledge
Metadata.Description: Design, setup, and optimization of personal and organizational knowledge bases (wikis), specializing in open, local-first architectures.

Package.Name: Personal Knowledge Base
Package.Description: Setup of personal knowledge bases powered by Quartz, Obsidian, and Cursor

Tier.Name: Standard
Tier.Description: Creation of a git-enabled Quartz knowledge base optimized for Obsidian/Cursor

Deliverables.Deliverable: Creation of a git-enabled Quartz knowledge base
Basic personalization of the boilerplate Quartz architecture

Tier.Name: Premium
Tier.Description: Enhanced personal knowledge base with custom features and personalized training

Package.Name: Team Knowledge Base
Package.Description: Setup of team-based knowledge management systems with collaboration features

Tier.Name: Standard
Tier.Description: Team knowledge base setup with git submodules and basic training

Deliverables.Deliverable: Creation of a git-enabled Quartz knowledge base

Example.Name: Ethereum Localism
Example.Description: Organizational knowledge base for community collaborative research

Example.Name: SuperBenefit Knowledge Garden
Example.Description: Personal knowledge base with custom theme and Arweave integration

Example.Name: Sensemaking Scenius
Example.Description: Knowledge base featuring custom graph visualization and advanced metadata

Tier.Name: Premium
Tier.Description: Enhanced team knowledge base with advanced collaboration features and workflow integration

Deliverables.Deliverable: Advanced Git submodule strategy for teams
Development of one bespoke organizational feature

Retainer.Name: Unified Knowledge Retainer
Retainer.Description: Technical maintenance, strategic guidance, and knowledge structure optimization

Services.Service: Technical maintenance (software updates, troubleshooting, backup verification)
Monthly knowledge structure review and optimization consultation (60-min call)
Basic usage analytics and improvement recommendations
Limited ad-hoc support via email (48-hour response time)

Module.Name: Custom Ontology Development
Module.Description: Design and implementation of sophisticated metadata schemas and taxonomies

Module.Name: Extended Training
Module.Description: Additional training sessions for new team members or advanced features

Module.Name: Content Migration
Module.Description: Assistance with importing content from other systems

Module.Name: Feature Development
Module.Description: Custom component or plugin development for specific client needs

Testimonial.Quote: The unified retainer has been invaluable. Having both technical support and strategic guidance in one package ensures our knowledge base continuously evolves with our organization.

Metadata.Name: Branding
Metadata.Description: Developing cohesive visual and verbal identities for organizations, focusing on clarity, consistency, and impact.

Package.Name: Brand Kit
Package.Description: Development of visual identity systems for organizations

Tier.Name: Essential
Tier.Description: Foundational visual identity with core brand elements

Deliverables.Deliverable: Logo design (2 concepts, 2 rounds of revisions)
Font selection and basic typography guidelines

Tier.Name: Comprehensive
Tier.Description: Complete visual identity system with extended brand assets

Deliverables.Deliverable: Extended color palette with usage guidelines
Basic brand voice and tone notes

Package.Name: Campaign Kit
Package.Description: Specialized visual assets for campaigns and events by established brands

Tier.Name: Essential
Tier.Description: Core campaign visual identity and basic assets

Deliverables.Deliverable: Basic asset templates (social media, email header)
Color and typography specifications based on brand guidelines

Tier.Name: Comprehensive
Tier.Description: Full-scale campaign identity system with extended asset production

Deliverables.Deliverable: Campaign concept development (3 concepts, 2 rounds of refinement)
Campaign key visual system (primary and secondary visuals)
- Email marketing templates (header, footer, body sections)
Campaign visual style guide with usage examples
Asset organization system and file delivery

Tier.Name: Event
Tier.Description: Specialized campaign assets optimized for physical and virtual events

Deliverables.Deliverable: - Event photography/videography shot list and style guide
Post-event asset package for follow-up communications
